org.spongepowered.api.block.tile.carrier

Interface Beacon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Carrier, DataHolder, DataSerializable, TileEntity, TileEntityCarrier

    public interface Beacon
extends TileEntityCarrier
    Represents a Beacon.

    Beacons apply prescribed effects according to the BeaconData. Depending on the completed levels of the beacon, the effects may be applied at a further range or shorter range.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCompletedLevels()
      Gets the number of completed levels of valid beacon structure blocks beneath this beacon.
